alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Defiance, northwestern Henry, eastern Williams and western Fulton Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Holiday City to 6 miles south of Bryan. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bryan, Wauseon, Archbold, Montpelier, West Unity, Stryker, Fayette, Holiday City, West Jefferson, Pulaski, Farmer, Evansport, Oakshade, Pettisville, Zone, Ridgeville Corners, Williams Center, Gerald, Denson and Elmira. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 11 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
